# To enable GitHub Discussions:
# 1. Go to https://github.com/Tutu-Engine/tutuengine/settings
# 2. Scroll to "Features" section
# 3. Check "Discussions"
# 4. Click "Set up discussions"
# 5. Categories will be auto-created
#
# Custom categories to add after enabling:
# - "MCP & Integrations" â€” Discuss MCP server setup, tool development
# - "Network & Credits" â€” Discuss distributed computing, credit system
# - "Fine-Tuning" â€” Share fine-tuning configs, datasets, results
# - "Deployment" â€” Railway, Docker, self-hosting help
